title: American Flag AR Rifle Liquid Metal Sign – Nine Line Apparel
text:
Please allow 5-7 Business Days to Ship. These items will ship separately from your cart.

AR15 floating sculpture. Must have for 2nd amendment and freedom supporters as a great display piece in their living room! Each 100% American Made sculpture is cut from 1/8 inch steel plate and then hand polished. It is then heat treated and painted for color before finally being finished with a poured on epoxy coating.

Because each sculpture is hand made no two are alike. Each liquid metal sign comes with welded on hardware for hanging and 2 inch offsets which gives the sculpture a floating appearance. Hang it up in your living room or man-cave!

Features:
description: Molten Metal Sign that is Made in The USA. Sculptures are handmade and unique so no two are alike! Show your patriotism aloud and display this in your home with pride. Each is cut from a 1/8 inch steel plate, hand polished, and ready to be installed out of the box. Get yours today!
